txt.en: 'The corsairs have been building up the camp to the south a lot in the past few days. New tents have sprung up, camp-fires, lots of basic amenities to make life a more pleasant experience.\n\n'I think we should cause them some pain and discomfort and make their lives a little more miserable. Head into the camp and burn down several of the tents. Perhaps a few nights out in the rain will encourage them to simply move on.'
The corsairs at Hashadîr have increased in number as of late. Burning some tents will stretch their resources and make them uncomfortable.
'I hope they enjoy sleeping out in the rain tonight. The more miserable they are, the better things are for us.'
Hashadîr - A Place to Lie at Night
The tents are at Hashadîr, to the south of Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían asked you to venture to the corsair camp and burn down several tents.
Tolrían can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían will be pleased to hear the tents have been burned.
